channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: LVMH says its wine business took a 12% hit because people are too sad to buy champagne
item.description: LVMH CFO anticipates sales volumes will be “less bad” in the second half of the year.

item.title: How stocks perform historically on presidential election years — and why this year is different
item.description: With Election Day just a few months away, here's how the market tends to fare with its historical averages.

item.title: PCE to affirm inflation is slowing — but watch out for revisions
Chipotle CEO says ‘generous portions’ will become standard after people blasted its skimpy serving sizes on social media
item.description: Brian Niccol said roughly 10% of Chipotle’s restaurants are outliers in terms of portion sizes.

item.title: Small caps are finally getting their moment in the sun. Here's why managers think the rally can last
item.description: Small caps have underperformed for roughly the past decade, but they have typically done better historically.

item.title: NASA ‘not quite ready’ to bring Boeing Starliner astronauts home
The ultrarich are scooping up mansions while almost no one else can afford a typical home
item.description: Luxury-home prices rose more than twice as fast as non-luxury homes, and still their sales jumped compared to typical homes, according to Redfin.

item.title: OpenAI announces a search engine called SearchGPT; Alphabet shares dip
item.description: OpenAI announced a prototype of its SearchGPT search engine on Thursday.

item.title: No, CrowdStrike didn’t send $10 gift cards to customers after its outage
The 10 best prepaid debit cards you can get without a credit score
item.description: No checking account? No problem. These prepaid debit cards let you add funds and swipe to pay without a ton of fees.

item.title: Lineage begins trading in the market's largest IPO of 2024
item.description: Lineage, the largest temperature-controlled warehouse REIT in the world, rose by as much as 5% after going public under the ticker symbol "LINE."

item.title: The stock market’s cruel summer is about to get much worse
Biles, Osaka, Richardson Olympic comebacks highlight issues facing people like them: ‘We’re still asking a lot of Black women athletes’
item.description: They've all bounced back to the world's biggest stage while displaying different levels of vulnerability.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: Ford, Viking Therapeutics, ServiceNow and more
item.description: These are the stocks posting the largest moves in midday trading.

item.title: Royal Caribbean's CEO explains why demand for cruises remains so strong
